text: This store is amazing when you get inside there is like you enter in other world 🌍. Everything looks so good 😊 May be a little expensive.

This was our introduction to Seoul Shopping, and the typical multi level floors starting with beauty and ending with duty free with fashion and home at levels in between. The floors are not spacious so you seem to be going round and round using the escalators to get upstairs or downstairs. Be aware the duty free shops in Seoul sell in US dollars and on the day we went it was very busy with many customers.
